Specimen Type: Peripheral whole blood (for genomic DNA extraction)
Purpose: To detect pathogenic genetic variants associated with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy by sequencing a targeted gene panel.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, Nanodrop spectrophotometer, Qubit fluorometer, PCR thermal cycler, gel electrophoresis system, Next-Generation Sequencer (e.g., Illumina), Sanger sequencer
